edu.ucsd.cse232b.jsidrach.xquery

Class XQueryEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsd.cse232b.jsidrach.xpath.XPathEvaluator
      • edu.ucsd.cse232b.jsidrach.xquery.XQueryEvaluator

  • public class XQueryEvaluator
extends XPathEvaluator
    XQueryEvaluator - Collection of functions to evaluate a XQuery expression

    All methods are public, to be accessed by XQueryVisitor
